course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Design Thinking
course.description: Design Thinking is about accelerating or facilitating innovation to create better solutions to the challenges facing business and society and creating sustainable advantages.  We will cover design as a science, and the relationships between design and major business functions such as innovation, marketing, technology management etc. By the end of the course, students are expected to be able to understand the principles and practices of design thinking.
